channel.title: Setting up SRL 4
channel.description:
[ul][center][size=14pt][b]Setting Up SRL 4![/b][/size] [size=13pt][u]By IP-Drowner[/u][/size][/center]
[b]Information:[/b] This guide was created for members to know how to setup the latest SRL version and Subversion Repository. This guide is a replacement to the outdated thread originally created by StarBlaster100.
[b]VISTA:[/b] Do you have Windows Vista and you're getting errors when using/installing SRL 4? Then [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,281173.msg2285140.html#msg2285140]Click Here[/url] to go to the right thread on how to fix your problem.
[b]Requirements:[/b] [url=http://subversion.tigris.org/files/documents/15/39559/svn-1.4.5-setup.exe]SRL Subversion Installation File - By Tigris[/url] [url=http://freddy1990.com/scar.php]Latest SCAR Divi Version[/url]
[b]Method:[/b] 1) Download and Install [url=http://freddy1990.com/scar.php]SCAR Divi CDE[/url]. 2) Download and Install [url=http://subversion.tigris.org/files/documents/15/39559/svn-1.4.5-setup.exe]Subversion Repository Setup[/url]. 3) Once both have been installed, open SCAR Divi CDE. 4) Go to the File menu: [IMG]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/7492/filepq0.jpg[/img] 5) Then select [b]Download SRL[/b]: 6) Once finished downloading, go to the Tools menu: [img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/778/toolshr0.jpg[/img] 7) Then select Options: [img]http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/5796/optionszj5.jpg[/img] 8)Go to the SRL Download Tab: [img]http://img528.imageshack.us/img528/9148/srldownloadfo9.jpg[/img] 9) Check the Subversion Repository radio button: [img]http://img229.imageshack.us/img229/1558/selectsubdk5.jpg[/img] 10) Select Checkout: [img]http://img134.imageshack.us/img134/9116/checkoutsubvw7.jpg[/img] 11) If any popup windows appear, select either [i]Yes[/i] or [i]Ok[/i] to them. 12) You should now have the latest SRL Subversion installed.
Enjoy.[/ul]

item.title: Setting up SRL 4
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

[quote=“red-dragon, post:19, topic:198800”]Line 68: [Error] (17604:12): Unknown identifier ‘STRING1’ in script C:\DOCUME~1\admin\LOCALS~1\Temp\WeibsPowerMiner_V.9-1.scar
error help me please[/quote]
That’s an error in the script, not SRL. That script is outdated from what I know. You should try to select a more recent WORKING script. Go to SRL for any further help.

Read full topic

item.title: Setting up SRL 4
item.dc:creator: @killstream killstream
item.description:
@killstream wrote:

Yeah I am

I looked up libeay32.dll

then I tried to delete it and it wouldn’t let me.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 26, 2008, 11:18:27 PM[/size][hr]I fixed it

If anyone else has this problem, follow these steps:

Start, search in my computer for libeay32.dll and delete the one with subversion in it… then just redownload it

Read full topic

item.title: Setting up SRL 4
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

[ul][center][size=14pt]Setting Up SRL 4![/size]
[size=13pt]By IP-Drowner[/size][/center]

Information:
This guide was created for members to know how to setup the latest SRL version and Subversion Repository. This guide is a replacement to the outdated thread originally created by StarBlaster100.

VISTA:
Do you have Windows Vista and you’re getting errors when using/installing SRL 4? Then Click Here to go to the right thread on how to fix your problem.

Requirements:
SRL Subversion Installation File - By Tigris
Latest SCAR Divi Version

Method:

  1. Download and Install SCAR Divi CDE.
  2. Download and Install Subversion Repository Setup.
  3. Once both have been installed, open SCAR Divi CDE.
  4. Go to the File menu:
  5. Then select Download SRL:
  6. Once finished downloading, go to the Tools menu:
  7. Then select Options:

    8)Go to the SRL Download Tab:
  8. Check the Subversion Repository radio button:
  9. Select Checkout:
  10. If any popup windows appear, select either Yes or Ok to them.
  11. You should now have the latest SRL Subversion installed.

Enjoy.[/ul]

Read full topic
